channel.title: My model in cleit, client crash
channel.description: hi! i have my own model created, and i am very proud ov myslefe now. The id of the model is 18521 and the item id is 15353. its a cape. So now i cant add it into the cleint as new i tem, so i hat repleaced atack cape t with the new model. if now a player wears the cape i cant see him. If i try to open a shop whre te item is sold, my client chrassed. It happent the same if a player trys to give me the cape. can me one give the correct code? I dont can it make by my self. Please no link to a turorial.

item.title: My model in cleit, client crash
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

I took some deciphering classes and this is what I came up with.
His problem is that he added a cape and attempted to make the item ints, but he thinks he failed because the cape appears invisible.
His problem is that the cape has too much polygons. Probably that stupid pkcape I saw a while back with 3.6k polygons.

Read full topic
item.source: My model in cleit, client crash

Firstly this is the WRONG FUCKING SECTION!! Secondly if your not retarded you can figure out how to do this and its called ‘addmodel’ thats a hint for you. And thirdly idc if your german learn fucking english please it will save you alot of time and us alot of time also

ok, my grammar isn’t good, because i’m german ;D
so my problem:
I add a model, with the id 18521.
Now: how can I use it?? I alredy had add it to my server in item.java. (id 15353)
What I musst do? Please no tutorial link! It’s nice, if someone can give me the code.
